Turning Dreams Into Reality

Study, Work & Live!

Study in canada
Migrate to canada

Overseas Education and Study Visa Consultants

We boast of some of the finest educational consultants in the country who help to provide world class services in Nigeria.

Canada Immigration

Canada is in a great need of immigrant. Let our authorised immigration officers work with you today. apply 

IELTS Accredited Registrar

Register online for an IELTS exam with Maple Education Inc.

About Maple

Enhance your success rates with our Advisors

Maple Education Canada Inc. was conceived with a simple friendly question over the phone – “Can you help find a good Canadian school for my child?”

As a relatively new Canadian immigrant in the late 1990s and the early 2000s, Ebi Obaro received quite a number of requests from friends in Nigeria to help place their kids in Canadian schools. What started out as a favour to friends soon took up practically all of her time. However, this development did not bother her in the least, because she felt a sense of satisfaction every time an application was successful and she received an admission letter. It was only a matter of time before she turned this new-found hobby into a full time business.

Book Consultation

Academic Counseling

We offer educational counseling to all students. We explain how the Canadian education system.

Flight Arrangement

Booking for our clients and offer reliable chaperoned travelling services.

Speedy Admission

With our Affiliation, we are able to offer prospective students a speedy application process 

Residence Facility

We provide residence facilities to our students studying in Fort St. John, British Columbia.

Study Permit

After admission into a Canadian institution, we assist you with study permit application.

Orientation & Tour

We provide specialized orientation and tours to Canada for our clients.

We are affiliated with over 65 canadian universities

Study in Canada at
your favourite Institution

Study abroad in your favorite university

You already have a university in mind? Great! Maple education Inc. will help you in studying in the institution of your choice. You don’t know where to go? No problem! We also help in choosing the right university based on your preferences, with our long list of partner schools, you cannot go wrong with us.

Canada is a cool place to live

Choose your destination

Choose your destination

“THE GREAT WHITE NORTH” is a tag that properly captures the magnificence and size of Canada. Amidst its large area space, Canada is home to three of the best cities in the world. The blissful land is blessed with a rich blend of dynamic culture which is why many refer to her as a “multicultural melting pot”. Canada has one of the lowest rates of crime in the world, no wonder other countries envy her grace. The low rate of crime in the country has boosted her reputation across all boarders. Furthermore, the education offered in the country is second to none, Canada values education and has long ensured all young citizens have access to the best schooling available no matter their background. You too can enjoy great life in Canada…

Assess your eligibility

Next
